net.floodlightcontroller.core.internal

接口 ISwitchDriverRegistry


  • public interface ISwitchDriverRegistry
    Maintain a registry for SwitchDrivers. Drivers can register with the registry and a user can get IOFSwitch instances based on the switch's OFDescriptionStatistics. A driver registers itself by specifying a prefix string of the switch's manufacturer description. When a user request an IOFSwitch instance the registry matches the manufacturer description of the switch against the prefixes in the registry. See getOFSwitchInstance() for a description of the lookup contract

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void addSwitchDriver(java.lang.String manufacturerDescriptionPrefix, IOFSwitchDriver driver)
      Register an IOFSwitchDriver with the registry
      IOFSwitchBackend getOFSwitchInstance(IOFConnectionBackend connection, SwitchDescription description, org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFFactory factory, org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId datapathId)
      Return an IOFSwitch instance according to the switch description.

    • 方法详细资料

      • addSwitchDriver

        void addSwitchDriver(java.lang.String manufacturerDescriptionPrefix,
                     IOFSwitchDriver driver)
        Register an IOFSwitchDriver with the registry
        参数:
        manufacturerDescriptionPrefix - Register the given prefix with the driver.
        driver - A IOFSwitchDriver instance to handle IOFSwitch instantiation for the given manufacturer description prefix
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the the manufacturer description is already registered
        NullPointerExeption - if manufacturerDescriptionPrefix is null
        NullPointerExeption - if driver is null

      • getOFSwitchInstance

        IOFSwitchBackend getOFSwitchInstance(IOFConnectionBackend connection,
                                     SwitchDescription description,
                                     org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFFactory factory,
                                     org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId datapathId)
        Return an IOFSwitch instance according to the switch description. The driver with the longest matching prefix will be picked first. The description is then handed over to the choosen driver to return an IOFSwitch instance. If the driver does not return an IOFSwitch (returns null) the registry will continue to the next driver with a matching manufacturer description prefix. If no driver returns an IOFSwitch instance the registry returns a default OFSwitchImpl instance. The returned switch will have its description reply and switch properties set according to the SwitchDescription passed in
        参数:
        connection - The main OF connection
        description - The SwitchDescription for which to return an IOFSwitch implementation
        factory - The factory to use to create OF messages.
        datapathId -
        debugCounterService; - used to create a new switch if one does not exist
        返回:
        A IOFSwitch implementation matching the description or an OFSwitchImpl if no driver returned a more concrete instance.
        抛出:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If the SwitchDescription or any of its members is null.
